title: Its totally gonna be C9 vs SKT Finals, IDK What all the other kids are joking about LMAO
body:
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

Just remember you saw it here first 

I Was right about TSM going home with IMT and 

I'm not about to be wrong here 

Trust me, I'm the real PROPHET

replies.body: Even though WE had the edge, I can see C9 pulling the win. I don’t see that vs LZ

> [{quoted}](name=xJLx MCHammer,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dAnGn34b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-16T21:33:47.598+0000)
>
> Even though WE had the edge, I can see C9 pulling the win. I don’t see that vs LZ

What about, if by some miracle, Samsung beats LZ?  Do you think they have a snowballs chance then?  ... being legitimate with this question, cause I only just started watching competitive League, and haven't really had time to look into the Korean or Chinese teams very much.

> [{quoted}](name=Gen Nakazora,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dAnGn34b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-16T23:00:44.138+0000)
>
> What about, if by some miracle, Samsung beats LZ?  Do you think they have a snowballs chance then?  ... being legitimate with this question, cause I only just started watching competitive League, and haven't really had time to look into the Korean or Chinese teams very much.

Yes, Samsung Galaxy didn't look too good.  C9 would have a chance 30/70 or 40/60

I also assumed H2K would have a chance vs SMG last year. H2K lost badly.
